title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 32.2 - Capital stock requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 32.2 - Capital stock requirement

State Regulations

To determine if the capital stock requirement is met, the
rules in section
6-2.2
of this Title shall be used, except that any reference to "fifty percent" shall be substituted by "eighty
percent". Corporations that meet the capital stock requirement are "related
corporations" for purposes of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
32.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
